text:
The log4j.properties file is not written using the webapp directory specified 
in the build.properties tomcat.home.dir

It seems to be hardcoded to  /var/lib/tomcat4/webapps/lenya/WEB-INF/logs/
Which does not work under tomcat5 (I know that isn't the supported version!)
The directory is therefore not created and at stqrtup it results in the 
exception:

log4j:ERROR setFile(null,true) call failed.
java.io.FileNotFoundException: /var/lib/tomcat4/webapps/lenya/WEB-
INF/logs/log4j.log (No such file or directory)
 etc.
creator: ken.blackler@jrc.it

text: Added lenya-dev@cocoon.apache.org to CC-list of this entry.
creator: A.Kuckartz@ping.de

text:
this is no longer an issue since we now use a log4j configuration that is
relative to the webapp context
creator: gregor@apache.org
